sentence.Network_en: The tendency to expatiate and make much of local advantages was Western.
sentence.Network_cn: 欢喜唠唠叨叨、夸张本地优点的脾气是西部特有的.

sentence.Network_en: My present purpose is not to expatiate upon my walks.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在我并不打算絮絮不休地描写我的散步.

sentence.Network_en: It is unnecessary to expatiate on the effect of this downright refusal of the woman's proposals.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个女人的求婚遭到一口回绝之后发生了什么事情,我们无需多费笔墨来描述.

author expatiated on components and law presumption made a study of disputes on qualitative analysis of this behavior , and out juristic inconsistency with crime of bribery punished .笔者阐述受贿罪的构成要件和法律认定，分析医务人员收受药品、器械回扣的定性、定罪的争议，提出以受贿罪论处存在的法律矛盾。

first this paper analyses JM's macro , micro and interior environment and expatiates JM's opportunities and risks , also defines JM's advantages and weaknesses .首先，本文对公司所处的宏观环境、微观环境进行分析，阐述公司外部环境中存在的机会和威胁，认清公司的优势和劣势。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'roam freely'): from Latin exspatiari 'move beyond one's usual bounds', from ex- 'out, from' + spatiari 'to walk' (from spatium 'space')

means.word_mean: 1. add details, as to an account or idea; clarify the meaning of and discourse in a learned way, usually in writing;
